The goal of `b3doc` is to render externally stored Rmarkdown files (eg in vignettes from other packages) to local markdown files so they can be reused for the project documentation website. The package also provides functionality to enrich the rendered markdown in the frontmatter.


## Installation

You can install the development version of `b3doc` from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```r
devtools::install_github("b-cubed-eu/b3doc#9")
```


## Contributing

We welcome contributions! Please raise issues on the [issue tracker](https://github.com/b-cubed-eu/b3doc/issues) or submit pull requests.
